name: The Crimson Serpent (A Broken Pirate's story on the side)
name_original: The Crimson Serpent (A Broken Pirate's story on the side)
description:
You wake aboard the abandoned Crimson Serpent all alone... apart from the rats. What has happened to the crew?

This is a side story from  A Broken Pirate's Cursed Heart game made in Bitsy.

Use the arrow keys to move and interact with objects etc.

British Library images shown here were used for inspiration.

Edit: Updated 20/05/2018, to include bug fixes, new graphics and improved play through.
